creator: Creative App's
descriptionHtml:
Aghori Mahakal Photo Editor is an innovative app for religious people who have real faith in Lord Shiva.

We have amazing Mahakal symbols, photo frames which you can set on your photos. This is a perfect Shiva DP Maker App to make beautiful pictures according to your photo editing skills. Share Mahadev Status images on WhatsApp and other social media apps.

Take selfies or pictures of your friends and place Shiva symbols in your pictures!
Celebrate shravan mas With Shiva DP Maker App.

This Shiva photo maker (Aghori Mahakal photo editor) app available on the Google play store. When you edit the photo with this app, it will look like you have made a use of Shiva Mahakal Photo Frames or photo montage app.

How to Use Aghori Mahakal photo editor App?

* Select a photo from the gallery or capture with a camera;
* Crop photo according to android device;
* Add Mahakal Symbols in personal image;
* Adjust the Shiva image in suitable positions;
* Add multiple Shiva symbols in a single image;
* Save final image and share on Whatsapp, Facebook, Instagram and other social apps.

**key feature**

, Frame , Editor.

Lord Shiva is known by various names such as bhagwan Shiv Shankar, Mahadev, Bholenath, Mahakal, Bhairava, Bhootnath, Kailashnath, Omkar, Pashupati, Rudra, Sadashiva, shiv Shambhu bhole bhandari, shivaay, Shivay etc.

Lord Shiva's 12 Jyotir Linga temples are Somnath, Mahakaleshwar, Omkareshwar, Kedarnath, Bhimshankar, Kashi Vishwanath, Trimbakeshwar, Ramanathaswamy, Grishneshwar, Vaidyanath, Nageshvara and Mallikarjuna Swamy.
